summary:
The code defines a module for handling HTTP responses in an aiohttp web framework. It imports necessary libraries and modules, defines constants and utility functions, and provides classes for creating and managing HTTP responses. The main classes are `StreamResponse` and `Response`, which allow setting response headers, status codes, and body content. The module also includes a `json_response` function for creating JSON responses. The `ContentCoding` enum defines the supported compression types. The `body` property returns the response body, which can be either a byte string or a `Payload` object. The module also provides a `ZZLibCompressor` for handling compression.
The user wants a summary of the functionality of the code. They gave a snippet of code from aiohttp/web_response.py. The summary should start directly with the content, no "This code does..." etc. Should focus on business logic, inputs, outputs. Use Chinese (e.g., Chinese/English). Also mention compression handling, content coding, etc.
